message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140.  It's a great deal, as you know it's worth $150 to you! Let me know what you think.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $130 for your product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking to get closer to $140.  How about we split the difference and I sell it to you for $135? Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $130 for your product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
